name: Crumbling Terror
description:
A short psychological horror game.

You have been stranded in a forest while searching for the campsite of your friends, a note tells you where they have gone and now you're trying to find them. On your adventure to find them, some things start to not make so much sense.. What  happened? What is wrong with me?

Good to knows:

Be sure to wear headphones for best experience.
If you see a Hand symbol it means you can pick it up.
If you see a Eye symbol it means you can Analyze it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

What you can do at the moment in the game:

You can use inventory.
Doors + Locked doors if you picked up a key.
Pickup Notes.
Interactable objects.
Light candles.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Controls.

1 - 2 = switches inventory
E = Interact
Left click + Lighter = Lighter on

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
